testcase.name: 4 - I can find a list of container types CT-4-2 Should sort columns

failure.message: Timed out retrying: cy.click() failed because this element is detached from the DOM. Name Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > cy.as() This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands. https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
